se.cbb.jprime.apps.dlrs

Class RealisationSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.apps.dlrs.RealisationSampler

  • public class RealisationSampler
extends java.lang.Object
    Enables sampling of realisations, i.e., dated embeddings of G in S according to the probability distribution of embeddings under the DLRS model.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RealisationSampler(PRNG prng, RBTree S, RBTree G, NamesMap names, RBTreeArcDiscretiser times, IntMap loLims, DupLossProbs dupLossProbs, DoubleArrayMap atsProbs)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Realisation sample()
      Samples a realisation given the current guest tree, "at-probabilities", p11-probabilities, etc.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RealisationSampler

        public RealisationSampler(PRNG prng,
                  RBTree S,
                  RBTree G,
                  NamesMap names,
                  RBTreeArcDiscretiser times,
                  IntMap loLims,
                  DupLossProbs dupLossProbs,
                  DoubleArrayMap atsProbs)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        prng - pseudo-random number generator.
        S - host tree S.
        G - guest tree G.
        names - leaf names of G.
        times - times of discretised host tree S'.
        loLims - lowest possible placement of u of V(G) in discretised S'.
        dupLossProbs - p11, etc.
        ats - rooted subtree G_u probability for u of V(G).

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        public Realisation sample()
        Samples a realisation given the current guest tree, "at-probabilities", p11-probabilities, etc.
